name: Lila Kari
content: Lila Kari | Cheriton School of Computer Science | University of Waterloo Skip to main content Lila Kari Professor, and University Research Chair Contact Information lila@uwaterloo.ca Location: DC 1312 Groups Professors, Faculty Links Link to personal webpage: https://cs.uwaterloo.ca/~lila/ Additional Information Degrees Ph.D., University of Turku, Finland (1991) M.Sc., University of Bucharest, Romania (1987) Research interests Biodiversity informatics, Comparative genomics, Genomic signatures, Machine learning Natural computation, Bio-inspired computing, Bio-molecular computing Watson-Crick complementarity in formal languages, DNA computing & combinatorics on words Publications Lila Kari on Wikipedia Lila Kari on Google Scholar
